DOC.brief_summary: Multi-locus and multi-gene studies of atrial fibrillation, focusing on renin-angiotensin system genes and C reactive protein gene
DOC.brief_title: Genetic Study of Atrial Fibrillation: Focusing on Renin-Angiotensin System and C-Reactive Protein Genes
DOC.criteria: Patients with atrial fibrillation Patients with atrial fibrillation who are reluctant for the study
